data.title: Seasonal Roads
data.text:
UDOT closes the following roads through the winter, typically November through May or June, depending on the weather.

SR-39 Monte Cristo (east of Ogden) – open until Fall 2024

SR-65 East Canyon (northeast of Salt Lake City) – open until Fall 2024

SR-190 Guardsman Pass (Brighton to Park City) – open until Fall 2024

SR-224 Guardsman Pass (Park City to Brighton) – open until Fall 2024

SR-92 American Fork Canyon / Alpine Loop – open until Fall 2024

SR-150 Mirror Lake Highway (east of Kamas to near the Wyoming border) – open until Fall 2024

SR-35 Wolf Creek Summit (east of Francis to west of Hanna) – open until Fall 2024

SR-153 Mount Holly (west of US-89 in Junction to Puffer Lake) – open until Fall 2024

SR-148 Cedar Breaks National Monument (east of Cedar City) – open until Fall 2024

The UDOT Traffic website and app contain the status in the Mountain Passes map layer.

For other non-state maintained routes, like the Nebo Loop, please inquire locally for seasonal closure information.
